channel.title: Projects on Janet Brady: artist
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Janet Brady: artist

item.title: Neo exhibition
item.description: This collection is from St George’s Gallery. Pop into neo: gallery in the MarketPlace… I’m proud to be part of this cutting edge contemporary art group!

item.title: Pembrokeshire
item.description: Here is some work from a short trip in November 2016.

item.title: Re:allotted
item.description: Here is some of the work I’m exhibiting at St George’s Gallery, Bolton this February. I’ve made collagraphs out of some sketches I did visiting various allotments. I’ve been fascinated to find out about the network of fungi in the soil beneath that lives in a symbiotic relationship with the plants above. It reminds me of the internet and the way we might also live in a symbiotic relationship with each other.

item.title: Limestone Country Arnside
item.description: This work is about the ancient limestone landscape around Arnside.
